Detailed Description

cvmx_hna_difctl

To write to the HNA_DIFCTL register, a device issues an IOBST directed at the HNA with addr[34:32]=0x6. To read the HNA_DIFCTL register, a device issues an IOBLD64 directed at the HNA with addr[34:32]=0x6.

This register is intended to only be written once (at power-up). Any future writes could cause the HNA and FPA hardware to become unpredictable. If HNA_CONFIG[HPUCLKDIS]=1 (HNA-HPU clocks disabled), reads/writes to HNA_DIFCTL do not take effect. If the HNA-disable FUSE is blown, reads/writes to HNA_DIFCTL do not take effect.
